about_the_game:
"

FG Haunted Interiors Map Pack

The Haunted Interiors Maps Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This map pack consists of nearly 100 images that can be used to create or enhance existing maps to more classic haunted interiors. Such as haunted houses, forbidden crypts and so on. This pack includes the following items:
  • Decorations of static webs, creepy items, blood splats and smears, lighting elements, and more
  • Fills of several texture overlays
  • Animated fills of dust particles, decorations of mist, drapes, bats, and more

"
detailed_description:
"

FG Haunted Interiors Map Pack

The Haunted Interiors Maps Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This map pack consists of nearly 100 images that can be used to create or enhance existing maps to more classic haunted interiors. Such as haunted houses, forbidden crypts and so on. This pack includes the following items:
  • Decorations of static webs, creepy items, blood splats and smears, lighting elements, and more
  • Fills of several texture overlays
  • Animated fills of dust particles, decorations of mist, drapes, bats, and more

"
